metadata.title: CVE-2016-3761 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: NfcService.java in NFC in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2,5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-07-01 allows attackers to obtainsensitive foreground-application information via a crafted backgroundapplication, aka internal bug 28300969.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
